item.title: OpenTelemetry on Azure Container Apps
item.description: Lately I’ve been working with OpenTelemetry to setup an observability environment for our running api services.

item.title: Maui Blazor Mobile Template
item.description: When you want to try out the .Net MAUI Blazor template, you will be able to run the standard Blazor test website on your mobile phone without any issues.

item.title: Maui Blazor Staggered View
item.description: Do you remember my staggered view solution for Xamarin Forms? If not, I blogged about it here: https://blog.

item.title: Xamarin Forms staggered view - Masonry
item.description: Some story background When developing mobile apps, you’ll often find different design trends that look great and sometimes you even want to adopt some of those trends in your own apps.

item.title: Xamarin Forms – Set entry clear icon color on iOS
item.description: Here is a small piece of code that you can use as a Xamarin Forms effect to hook into your entry.

item.title: Xamarin Forms - Custom Visual State triggers and Control Templates
item.description: Not so long ago there was this little online event called Xamarin Expert Day that featured a bunch of awesome speakers.
